channel.title: youtube on Internet Freedom Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in youtube on Internet Freedom Foundation

item.title: Social media giants have released their Compliance Reports for the month of August. We’ve analysed them.
item.description: Google (including YouTube), Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp and Twitter have released their reports in compliance with Rule 4(1)(d) of the IT Rules 2021 for the month of August.

item.title: IFF writes to Google India about recent instances of YouTube copyright strikes
item.description: We write to Google India highlighting that action taken upon copyright complaints is based on an incorrect application of copyright law and YouTube’s policies and, therefore, threatens press freedom and is in violation of the constitutional rights of digital media reporters and its audience.
